project.name: snapcar-sdk-js
project.description: The official SnapCar SDK for JavaScript that allows communication between your browser application and the SnapCar platform through the SnapCar Public API.

SnapCar.name: SnapCar

params.name: SnapCar
params.description: itself.
The jQuery plugin.

SnapCar.Error.name: SnapCar.Error
SnapCar.Error.description: Error object that is created upon errors such as a wrong API call.

params.name: type
params.description: The type of error.

params.name: message
params.description: A key which defines more precisely the type of error.

params.name: description
params.description: A human readable text describing the error. Not to be displayed to the user.

SnapCar.ConfigError.name: SnapCar.ConfigError
SnapCar.ConfigError.description: Represents an error created upon configuration issues such as trying to perform an API call with no token defined.

params.name: message
params.description: A key which defines more precisely the type of error.

params.name: description
params.description: A human readable text describing the error. Not to be displayed to the user.

SnapCar.InvalidParametersError.name: SnapCar.InvalidParametersError
SnapCar.InvalidParametersError.description: Represents an error created when trying to make API calls with invalid parameters.

params.name: message
params.description: A key which defines more precisely the type of error.

params.name: description
params.description: A human readable text describing the error. Not to be displayed to the user.

SnapCar.APIError.name: SnapCar.APIError
SnapCar.APIError.description: Represents an error received from the API.

params.name: data
params.description: The jQuery object.

SnapCar.ServiceClass.name: SnapCar.ServiceClass
SnapCar.ServiceClass.description: Represents an error received from the API.

SnapCar.MeetingPoint.name: SnapCar.MeetingPoint
SnapCar.MeetingPoint.description: Describes a meeting point that can optionnaly be attached to a booking for specific pick up location. It helps riders and drivers to find each other.

SnapCar.SpecialArea.name: SnapCar.SpecialArea
SnapCar.SpecialArea.description: Describes an area with specific meeting points that the rider may select to help him finding his driver at specific pick up locations.

SnapCar.ETAResult.name: SnapCar.ETAResult
SnapCar.ETAResult.description: Status and ETA for a specific service class.

SnapCar.Rider.name: SnapCar.Rider
SnapCar.Rider.description: A user who has the capability to make bookings.

SnapCar.BookingPrice.name: SnapCar.BookingPrice
SnapCar.BookingPrice.description: An order with a flat price which is created from booking information (ex. : start and end locations, service class, etc.) and that can be confirmed into a booking.

SnapCar.CancellationFee.name: SnapCar.CancellationFee
SnapCar.CancellationFee.description: Information about a booking cancellation fee.

SnapCar.Address.name: SnapCar.Address
SnapCar.Address.description: An address (typically for pick up or drop off).

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the address. Typically the number and street name.

params.name: city
params.description: The city.

params.name: postalCode
params.description: The postal code.

params.name: country
params.description: The country.

SnapCar.Location.name: SnapCar.Location
SnapCar.Location.description: A location representing an address as well as its GPS coordinate.

params.name: lat
params.description: The location latitude.

params.name: lng
params.description: The location longitude.

params.name: address
params.description: The location address.

SnapCar.BillingDocument.name: SnapCar.BillingDocument
SnapCar.BillingDocument.description: A billing document such as a bill or a credit note.

SnapCar.BillingDocumentTypes.name: SnapCar.BillingDocumentTypes
SnapCar.BillingDocumentTypes.description: All possible types of billing documents.

SnapCar.Vehicle.name: SnapCar.Vehicle
SnapCar.Vehicle.description: A vehicle in which a driver picks a rider up.

SnapCar.BookingHistory.name: SnapCar.BookingHistory
SnapCar.BookingHistory.description: A bookings list and its metadata.

params.name: limit
params.description: The maximum number of elements to return.

SnapCar.Booking.name: SnapCar.Booking
SnapCar.Booking.description: A booking that represents a request by the user to be picked up.

params.name: rider
params.description: The passenger of the booking. Typically the currently identifier user.

params.name: startLocation
params.description: The location at which the rider needs to be picked up.

params.name: endLocation
params.description: The location at which the rider needs to be dropped off.

params.name: plannedStartDate
params.description: The planned pick up date.

params.name: nameboard
params.description: Set to true if the nameboard option is required

params.name: driverInfo
params.description: Additional pick up information to provide the driver with.

params.name: meetingPoint
params.description: Meeting at which the rider will find his driver.

classitems.description: The web service base domain on which API calls are made. You can change this value in order to perform requests on demo/sandbox web services rather than the production one.
classitems.name: baseDomain

classitems.description: The user token. You must provide this value in order to be able to make API calls.
classitems.name: token

classitems.description: The user locale. As you may know, some information returned through the API are localized (ex. : the meeting point details). You need to set this value in order to receive data localized in the user language if supported. The fallbackLocale value is used otherwise.
classitems.name: locale

classitems.description: Locale used as a default in case you would provide a non supported locale value. Its value is "en".
classitems.name: fallbackLocale

classitems.description: The type of error.
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: A key which defines more precisely the type of error.
classitems.name: message

classitems.description: A human readable text describing the error. Not to be displayed to the user.
classitems.name: description

classitems.description: The type of error.
classitems.name: code

classitems.description: Additional details such as a list of invalid parameters. Refer to the API reference for more information.
classitems.name: details

classitems.description: The server response body.
classitems.name: serverResponse

classitems.description: The service class unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: The localized service class name to display to the user.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: Unique meeting point identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: Localized meeting point details that explain where the rider can meet his driver at the pick up location.
classitems.name: rdvPoint

classitems.description: Unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: Localized short name that briefly describes the area.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: Localized short value that describes the kind of meeting points that can be selected.
classitems.name: menuName

classitems.description: Indicates if the user is required to select a meeting point for this area.
classitems.name: selectionRequired

classitems.description: The type of special area. Can either be a station, an airport or a regular area. Refer to the SnapCar.SpecialAreaTypes values.
classitems.name: areaType

classitems.description: An array of meeting points in which the user can select his preferred one if the user hasn't enabled the nameboard option.
classitems.name: meetingPoints

classitems.description: An array of meeting points in which the user can select his preferred one if the user has enabled the nameboard option.
classitems.name: meetingPointsNameboard

classitems.description: Station area type constant. Its value is "station".
classitems.name: STATION

classitems.description: Airport area type constant. Its value is "airport".
classitems.name: AIRPORT

classitems.description: Normal area type constant. Its value is "normal".
classitems.name: NORMAL

classitems.description: Availability of the service class. Can be one of the SnapCar.ETAResultStatuses object values.
classitems.name: status

classitems.description: If the service is available, holds the ETA in seconds.
classitems.name: eta

classitems.description: The service class for which we want to know the ETA.
classitems.name: serviceClass

classitems.description: Means that the service class is available. Therefore, an ETA is provided.
classitems.name: OK

classitems.description: Means that the service class is not available.
classitems.name: UNAVAILABLE

classitems.description: Payment method unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: The payment method's name, as set by the user.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The payment method's type. At that time, 'credit_card' is the only possible value.
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: Credit card's masked number.
classitems.name: number

classitems.description: Credit card brand.
classitems.name: brand

classitems.description: The rider unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: The rider's firstname.
classitems.name: firstname

classitems.description: The rider's lastname.
classitems.name: lastname

classitems.description: The rider's email.
classitems.name: email

classitems.description: The rider account status. Its value is one of the SnapCar.RiderStatuses class properties. Check it out for more information.
classitems.name: status

classitems.description: The rider's payment method.
classitems.name: paymentMethod

classitems.description: The user has the right to make bookings.
classitems.name: BOOKING_ALLOWED

classitems.description: The user is not allowed to make bookings.
classitems.name: BOOKING_NOT_ALLOWED

classitems.description: The user is suspended.
classitems.name: SUSPENDED

classitems.description: The booking price unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: The price in the currency defined in the currency property.
classitems.name: price

classitems.description: The currency.
classitems.name: currency

classitems.description: A formatted string representing the price.
classitems.name: formattedPrice

classitems.description: The date of the validity date for the given price.
classitems.name: expiryDate

classitems.description: The service class for which the price is valid.
classitems.name: serviceClass

classitems.description: Creates a booking by confirming the booking price.
classitems.name: confirm

return.description: A Promise object. Success/progress handlers are called with a SnapCar.Booking as the single argument. If the booking has a specific planned start date, the success callbacks are called once the platform confirms the booking creation. However, if the booking has no planned start date, the progress callbacks are called once the platform confirms the booking creation and the success callbacks are called when the booking is no longer in the "pending" status (either accepted by the driver or cancelled). Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Whether a cancellation fee is charged.
classitems.name: charged

classitems.description: If charged, the cancellation amount.
classitems.name: amount

classitems.description: If charged, the currency of the cancellation fee.
classitems.name: currency

classitems.description: If charged, the price formatted in the currency.
classitems.name: formattedAmount

classitems.description: The name of the address. Typically the number and street name.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The postal code.
classitems.name: postalCode

classitems.description: The city.
classitems.name: city

classitems.description: The country.
classitems.name: country

classitems.description: The location latitude.
classitems.name: lat

classitems.description: The location longitude.
classitems.name: lng

classitems.description: The location address.
classitems.name: address

classitems.description: The point latitude.
classitems.name: lat

classitems.description: The point longitude.
classitems.name: lng

classitems.description: Billing document unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: URL of to download the document.
classitems.name: url

classitems.description: The type of document, refer to the SnapCar.BillingDocumentTypes properties.
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: Bill type. When the client is charged.
classitems.name: BILL

classitems.description: Credit note type. When the client is reimbursed.
classitems.name: CREDIT_NOTE

classitems.description: The vehile model.
classitems.name: model

classitems.description: The localized vehile color.
classitems.name: color

classitems.description: The current vehile position.
classitems.name: position

classitems.description: The vehile plate number.
classitems.name: plateNumber

classitems.description: The driver display name.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The driver's phone number.
classitems.name: phoneNumber

classitems.description: The driver unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: The date at which the coordinate has been saved.
classitems.name: date

classitems.description: The coordinate latitude.
classitems.name: lat

classitems.description: The coordinate longitude.
classitems.name: lng

classitems.description: The total number of bookings in the history.
classitems.name: total

classitems.description: The current position in the pagination.
classitems.name: offset

classitems.description: The number of bookings fetched.
classitems.name: count

classitems.description: The list of SnapCar.Booking fetched
classitems.name: history

classitems.description: Loads the next bookings in the history regarding the current offset in the pagination.
classitems.name: nextBookings

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with a SnapCar.BookingHistory as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Tells whether more bookings are available in the history regarding the current offset in the pagination and the total number of bookings. If yes, the SnapCar.BookingHistory.nextBookings method can be called.
classitems.name: moreBookingsAvailable

return.description: Whether more bookings are available or not.

classitems.description: The booking unique identifier.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: The passenger of the booking.
classitems.name: rider

classitems.description: The ordered service class for this booking.
classitems.name: serviceClass

classitems.description: The booking status, refer to the SnapCar.BookingStatuses properties to have a comprehensive list of all possible statuses.
classitems.name: status

classitems.description: The booking location's timezone.
classitems.name: timezone

classitems.description: The planned pick up date.
classitems.name: plannedStartDate

classitems.description: The booking creation date.
classitems.name: creationDate

classitems.description: The driver arrival date at the pick up location.
classitems.name: driverArrivalDate

classitems.description: The date at which the rider went on board.
classitems.name: startDate

classitems.description: Meeting at which the rider will find its driver.
classitems.name: meetingPoint

classitems.description: The date at which the rider has been dropped off.
classitems.name: endDate

classitems.description: The date at which the booking was cancelled (if relevant).
classitems.name: cancellationDate

classitems.description: This code indicates the reason why the booking was cancelled. Check out the SnapCar.BookingCancellationReasons static class properties.
classitems.name: cancellationReason

classitems.description: The pick up location.
classitems.name: startLocation

classitems.description: The location at which the rider has been dropped off.
classitems.name: endLocation

classitems.description: Additional pick-up information for the driver. Provided by the rider.
classitems.name: driverInfo

classitems.description: The initial order information.
classitems.name: bookingPrice

classitems.description: The total billed amount
classitems.name: billedAmount

classitems.description: The total VAT amount.
classitems.name: vatAmount

classitems.description: The tip given by the rider to the driver through the SnapCar application.
classitems.name: tip

classitems.description: A list of timestamped points describing the driver route from the pick up location.
classitems.name: route

classitems.description: The list of billing documents.
classitems.name: documents

classitems.description: The vehicle used by the driver to pick the rider up.
classitems.name: vehicle

classitems.description: Gets the booking cancellation price. Relevant only when the booking is either in the 'pending', 'going_to_get' or 'driver_waiting' state.
classitems.name: cancellationPrice

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with a SnapCar.CancellationFee as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Cancels the booking. You may want to check the cancellation price by using the SnapCar.Booking.cancellationPrice() method before doing so.
classitems.name: cancel

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with the updated instance of SnapCar.Booking as the single argument. Note that the initial instance itself is updated. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Refreshes the booking information.
classitems.name: refresh

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with the updated instance of SnapCar.Booking as the single argument. Note that the initial instance itself is updated. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Confirms the booking (without flat price) to the SnapCar platform. Before calling this method, you have to provide at least a rider, a startLocation and the desired serviceClass.
classitems.name: confirm

return.description: A Promise object. Success/progress handlers are called with a SnapCar.Booking as the single argument. If the booking has a specific planned start date, the success callbacks are called once the platform confirms the booking creation. However, if the booking has no planned start date, the progress callbacks are called once the platform confirms the booking creation and the success callbacks are called when the booking is no longer in the "pending" status (either accepted by the driver or cancelled). Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Calculates flat prices for all allowed service classes. Then, you may confirm one of these prices according to the service class selected by the user. The flat prices are based on the booking information (rider, planned start date, start location, end location, if the nameboard option is enabled). Before calling this method, you have to provide at least a rider, a startLocation and an endLocation which are the basic elements for price calculation. Flat prices cannot be calculated otherwise.
classitems.name: flatPrices

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with an array of SnapCar.BookingPrice as the single argument. Check the value of the SnapCar.BookingPrice.serviceClassId property in order to know to which service class a booking price is associated. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: When the booking is waiting for a driver to be attributed. Its value is "pending".
classitems.name: PENDING

classitems.description: When a driver has accepted a booking and is on his way to pick up the rider. Its value is "going_to_get".
classitems.name: GOING_TO_GET

classitems.description: When the driver has arrived at the pick up location and is waiting for the rider. Its value is "driver_waiting".
classitems.name: DRIVER_WAITING

classitems.description: When the rider is in the car. Its value is "on_board".
classitems.name: ON_BOARD

classitems.description: When the booking is ended, meaning that the rider has been dropped off. Its value is "complete".
classitems.name: COMPLETE

classitems.description: When the booking is cancelled. Its value is "cancelled".
classitems.name: CANCELLED

classitems.description: The booking has been cancelled by the rider, and not charged. Its value is "rider_cancellation".
classitems.name: RIDER_CANCELLATION

classitems.description: The booking has been cancelled by the rider, and has been charged a cancellation fee. Its value is "rider_cancellation_charged".
classitems.name: RIDER_CANCELLATION_CHARGED

classitems.description: The booking has been cancelled by SnapCar. Its value is "system_cancellation".
classitems.name: SYSTEM_CANCELLATION

classitems.description: The booking has been cancelled by SnapCar, and charged. Its value is "system_cancellation_charged".
classitems.name: SYSTEM_CANCELLATION_CHARGED

classitems.description: No driver was available for dispatch. Its value is "no_driver".
classitems.name: NO_DRIVER

classitems.description: Retrieves current ETA and availability for each service class.
classitems.name: eta

params.name: lat
params.description: Latitude of the position at which you want to get the current eta and availability.

params.name: lng
params.description: Longitude of the position at which you want to get the current eta and availability.

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with an array of SnapCar.ETAResult as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Retrieves a list of all allowed service classes at a specific location.
classitems.name: serviceClasses

params.name: lat
params.description: Latitude of the position at which you want to get the allowed service classes.

params.name: lng
params.description: Longitude of the position at which you want to get the allowed service classes.

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with an array of SnapCar.ServiceClass as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Retrieves meeting point information at a specific location.
classitems.name: meetingPoints

params.name: lat
params.description: Latitude of the position at which you want to get the information.

params.name: lng
params.description: Longitude of the position at which you want to get the information.

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with a SnapCar.SpecialArea as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error. Be aware that if no specific meeting point information is found at a location, the failure callback will be called with a SnapCar.APIError having a 404 code value.

classitems.description: Gets the currently authenticated user information.
classitems.name: user

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with a SnapCar.Rider as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Gets the currently authentified rider's active bookings.
classitems.name: activeBookings

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with an array of SnapCar.Booking as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

classitems.description: Gets the currently authentified rider's bookings history.
classitems.name: bookingsHistory

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with a SnapCar.BookingHistory as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

params.name: offset
params.description: The position of the first booking in the pagination.

params.name: limit
params.description: The maximum number of bookings to return.

classitems.description: Gets information about a specific booking.
classitems.name: booking

return.description: A Promise object. Success handlers are called with a SnapCar.Booking as the single argument. Failure handlers are called with a single SnapCar.APIError argument upon error.

params.name: id
params.description: The booking unique identifier.
